assignments.description: This is the path for a user creating a NEW disclosure. The assignment updates the Is_Record_Update variable, used throughout the flow to ensure that NEW/INSERT steps are taken.
assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Is_New_Disclosure
assignments.label: Copy 1 of Is New Disclosure

assignments.description: This is the path for a user to Update an existing disclosure already submitted. The assignment updates the Is_Record_Update variable, used throughout the flow to ensure that UPDATE steps are taken.
assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Is_Update
assignments.label: Copy 1 of Is Update

assignments.description: This is the path for a user to Update an existing disclosure already submitted. The assignment updates the Is_Record_Update variable, used throughout the flow to ensure that UPDATE steps are taken.
assignments.name: IP_Is_Update
assignments.label: Is Update

assignments.description: This is the path for a user creating a NEW disclosure. The assignment updates the Is_Record_Update variable, used throughout the flow to ensure that NEW/INSERT steps are taken.
assignments.name: IP_Is_Update_False
assignments.label: Is New Disclosure

assignments.description: Assignment to populate the record variable.
assignments.name: IP_Populate_Record_Variable
assignments.label: Populate Record Variable

decisions.description: This is a decision point to determine if user is creating a NEW disclosure or UPDATING an existing disclosure already created by checking if a Disclosure ID has been passed into the flow (Update) or not (Insert).
decisions.name: IP_Check_for_Disclosure_ID
decisions.label: Check for Disclosure ID

decisions.description: Checks that a Disclosure was returned and that we can continue with the flow, otherwise it defaults to a NEW record flow.
decisions.name: IP_Check_for_Disclosure_Record
decisions.label: Disclosure Found?

decisions.description: Should the flow create a draft Disclosure record to start populating
decisions.name: IP_Create_Draft
decisions.label: Create Draft?

Flow.description: New version with descriptions added to the flow components

formulas.description: Sets the Disclosure Date to todays date when the end user confirms that they are happy to submit the Disclosure.
formulas.name: IP_Confirm_DisclosureDate

Flow.label: TTS - Disclosure Flow

recordCreates.description: Creates a new draft Technology to save information to.
recordCreates.name: IP_Create_Draft_Disclosure
recordCreates.label: Create Draft Technology

recordLookups.description: The lookup gets required data from the IP object based on the Disclosure ID which was passed into the flow at the beginning. If there is a fault, it will exit to the generic Error Screen.
recordLookups.name: IP_Lookup_Disclosure
recordLookups.label: Lookup Disclosure

fields.name: Welcome
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to the Disclosure experience.


Let's start by looking up your contact info.

fields.name: New_Disclosure_Screen
fields.fieldText:
Let's start by reviewing your invention to better understand it's potential marketable value.


Could you please tell me a few things...

fields.name: Invention_Title
fields.fieldText: Invention Title
fields.helpText: Provide a short descriptive title of the invention.

fields.name: Description
fields.fieldText: Description
fields.helpText: Write a detailed description of the invention.

fields.name: Prior_Disclosure
fields.fieldText: Prior Disclosure

fields.name: Innovation
fields.fieldText: Innovation

fields.name: Future
fields.fieldText: Future

fields.name: Partners
fields.fieldText: Partners

fields.name: Researchers
fields.fieldText: Researchers

fields.name: Sponsored_Research
fields.fieldText: Sponsored Research

fields.name: Agreement_Type
fields.fieldText: Agreement Type

screens.description: Screen to gather the IP Name, Description, Variations, and Limitations on the disclosure from the user.
screens.name: IP_Details_Screen
screens.label: IP Details

fields.name: IP_Name_Short_Description
fields.fieldText: IP Name/Short Description

fields.name: IP_Provide_a_brief_description_of_the_Intellectual_Property
fields.fieldText: Provide a brief description of the Intellectual Property

fields.name: IP_Are_there_any_possible_variations_of_this_IP
fields.fieldText: Are there any possible variations of this IP

fields.name: IP_What_are_the_disadvantages_or_limitations_of_this_Intellectual_Property_Can
fields.fieldText: What are the disadvantages or limitations of this Intellectual Property? Can these be solved? How?

fields.name: IP_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
There was an error saving the record.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: IP_ErrorScreen_DisplayText_Bottom
fields.fieldText: If you recognise the error message above, then you may try saving the record again by pressing the PREVIOUS button below. Otherwise, please contact your Salesforce administrator with the error message mentioned above.

screens.description: Screen to determine if user has tested the disclosure experimentally, and if so to provide further details.
screens.name: IP_Experimental_Verification
screens.label: Experimental Verification

fields.name: IP_Have_you_tested_the_IP_Experimentally
fields.fieldText: Have you tested the IP Experimentally? If so, please provide details below.

fields.name: IP_FileUploadText
fields.fieldText: Please upload all Files, Documents and Supporting Evidence below.

value.stringValue: Please upload all related documents and evidence which relate to this disclosure

fields.name: IP_CreateNewDisclosure
fields.fieldText:
Your record has been successfully {!IsUpdateorInsert}!


ID: {!IP_Disclosure.Id}

fields.name: IP_FinalSubmission_CheckText
fields.fieldText:
Check the box below to confirm that you want to submit this disclosure, acknowledging the following statement:


To the best of my knowledge, I confirm that the subject matter disclosed herein is accurate and original to me. I understand that I am subject to the University’s policies, including the University’s Intellectual Property policy.

fields.name: IP_Offical_Submission_Confirmation
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I want to officially submit this Disclosure

fields.name: IP_Submission_Confirmation_TextBottom
fields.fieldText: Note: If you are not ready to submit this disclosure yet, leave the checkbox above unchecked and click Next.

screens.description: Screen to determine if any material was obtained from a source other than the laboratory or a commercial vendor for the disclosure.
screens.name: IP_Materials
screens.label: Materials

fields.name: IP_Please_describe_any_material_used_in_the_development_of_your_IP
fields.fieldText: Please describe any material used in the development of your Intellectual Property if that material was obtained from some source other than your laboratory or a commercial vendor.

screens.description: Screen to determine how the disclosure differs from existing technologies and current practices, and what problems it solves.
screens.name: IP_Novelty
screens.label: Novelty

fields.name: IP_How_does_this_Intellectual_Property_differ_from_existing_technologies
fields.fieldText: How does this Intellectual Property differ from existing technologies and current practices? What are its advantages and what problems does it solve?

screens.description: Screen to determine if user is aware of any prior inventions or publications by others, and if so to provide further details.
screens.name: IP_Prior_Art
screens.label: Prior Art

fields.name: IP_Are_you_aware_of_any_inventions_or_publications_by_others_that_are_related
fields.fieldText: Are you aware of any inventions or publications by others that are related to this Intellectual Property? If so, please provide details below.

screens.description: Screen to determine if user has identified any risks to the commercialisation of the disclosure and to provide the greatest impediment to the adoption.
screens.name: IP_Risks
screens.label: Risks

fields.name: IP_Identify_and_explain_the_risks_technological_or_otherwise
fields.fieldText: Identify and explain the risks (technological or otherwise) that could jeopardise the commercialisation of this Intellectual Property. Describe the greatest impediment to the adoption of your Intellectual Property.

screens.description: Screen to gather if the disclosure is within scope of another sponsored program from the user.
screens.name: IP_Sponsorship
screens.label: Sponsorship

fields.name: Was_the_Intellectual_Property_conceived_within_the_scope_of_a_sponsored_program
fields.fieldText: Was the Intellectual Property conceived within the scope of a sponsored program? If so, please provide details below.

screens.description: Screen to determine possible uses or applications, now and in the future, of the disclosure.
screens.name: IP_Utility
screens.label: Utility

fields.name: IP_What_are_possible_uses_or_applications_of_this_Intellectual_Property
fields.fieldText: What are possible uses or applications of this Intellectual Property? In addition to direct applications, are there any other uses that might be realised in the future?

variables.description: Looks up the contact related to the currently logged in user.
variables.name: IP_Current_User

variables.description: Container object for the disclosure form. This would be pre populated if disclosure ID is passed into the flow. Otherwise this would be used to store information that would be submitted to Salesforce at the end of the flow.
variables.name: IP_Disclosure
